title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 May 2017 - XWiki
content:

18:36 <fathernelson> has joined #xwiki  
18:39 <fathernelson> Hello #xwiki - I am attempting to set up SSL for an xwiki-enterprise-web-8.4.5 install running on Jetty 9.4.4 behind an Apache web server and I am having some issues with loading the WYSIWYG editor (specifically CKEditor installed as an extension). Would anyone have 5 minutes to chat?  
19:17 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
19:41 <fathernelson> has quit  
19:42 <fathernelson> has joined #xwiki  
21:10 <fathernelson> has quit  
21:24 <fathernelson> has joined #xwiki  
21:24 <fathernelson> test  
21:26 <fathernelson> Alright, I am not back requesting assistance, but instead would like to note the answer to the question I previously posed as well as the steps taken so that the issue resolution can be indexed for those who may experience it in the future  
22:29 <fathernelson> Which I will post shortly  
23:06 <evalica> has quit
